languages.text: "Переключить машину с приема на передачу. Используем его вместо астропатического хора колонии".
"Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."
languages.original_text: "Переключить машину с приема на передачу. Используем его вместо астропатического хора колонии".

traits.locale_text: "Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of our astropathic choir."
"Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of our astropathic choir."
"Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."
"Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of our Astropathic Choir."

"Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."
"Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."
"Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."

languages.text: “将机器从接收状态切换至发送状态，我们要用它来代替殖民地的星语唱诗班。”
languages.original_text: "Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: “将机器从接收状态切换至发送状态，我们要用它来代替殖民地的星语唱诗班。”
“将机器从接收状态切换至发送状态，我们要用它来代替星语唱诗班。”

languages.text: «Cambie la máquina de recepción a transmisión. La usaremos en lugar del Coro de Astrópatas de la colonia».
languages.original_text: "Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: «Cambie la máquina de recepción a transmisión. La usaremos en lugar del Coro de Astrópatas de la colonia».

languages.text: 「機械を受信から送信に切り替えるんだ。コロニーの感応通信聖歌隊の代わりに使うとしよう」
languages.original_text: "Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: 「機械を受信から送信に切り替えるんだ。感応通信聖歌隊の代わりに使うとしよう」
「機械を受信から送信に切り替えるんだ。感応通信聖歌隊の代わりに使うとしよう」

languages.text: « Passez la machine en mode émetteur, et non récepteur. Elle remplacera le chœur astropathique de la colonie. »
languages.original_text: "Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: « Passez la machine en mode émetteur, et non récepteur. Elle remplacera le chœur astropathique de la colonie. »

languages.text: "Schaltet die Maschine von Empfang auf Senden. Wir werden sie anstelle des astropathischen Chors der Kolonie benutzen."
languages.original_text: "Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: "Schaltet die Maschine von Empfang auf Senden. Wir werden sie anstelle des astropathischen Chors der Kolonie benutzen."
"Schaltet die Maschine von Empfang auf Senden. Wir nutzen sie statt des astropathischen Chors."

languages.text: "Makinenin alıcı işlevi yerine verici işlevini kullanalım. Kolonideki Astropatik Koro'nun yerini alsın."
languages.original_text: "Switch the machine from receiving to transmitting. We will use it in place of the colony's Astropathic Choir."

traits.locale_text: "Makinenin alıcı işlevi yerine verici işlevini kullanalım. Kolonideki Astropatik Koro'nun yerini alsın."
